name: 劉俊麟　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CALD 軟體工具介紹。
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.
schedule:
Week1:  Review of Logic Design Fundamentals (1/2)
Week2:  Review of Logic Design Fundamentals (2/2)
Week3:  Introduction to Verilog (1/3)
Week4:  Introduction to Verilog (2/3)
Week5:  Introduction to Verilog (3/3)
Week6:  Introduction to PLD
Week7:  Design Examples (1/2)
Week8:  Design Examples (2/2)
Week9:  Midterm Exam.
Week10: SM Charts and Microprogramming
Week11: Designing with FPGA (1/2)
Week12: Designing with FPGA (2/2)
Week13: Floating-point Arithmetic
Week14: Additional Topics in Verilog (1/2)
Week15: Additional Topics in Verilog (2/2)
Week16: Design of a RISC Microprocessor
Week17: Hardware Testing and Design for Testability
Week18: Final Exam.
